column5: What a great contribution to our team's Carp entry Coach!!  Betcha had a nice big glass of cold water when ya got home after that battle eh??
Great report GCD!  Those buffalo are totally cool. Awesome catch for sure.  I hear they can grow to 70+lbs in the southern States.  Definitely on my life's To-Catch list.
wow that thing is fat! thanks for sharing  Cheers!
that is one nasty looking fish with them beady eyes. Big tho none the less
How could you even touch that thing ,Dawg?I woulda thrown my pole in the water as soon as I saw that pile of stuff on the end of my line.Nice report though... Joe
Man that thing is built for power! Nice catch!
Yes, that IS a good report. Glad you had a good day. Are you sending the net to the dry cleaners now?
that is one very cool looking fish.
dam.......... wish i had of been there.   Would have offered ya 50$ to kiss it on the lips
Dang !!!! Now that is a wallhanger if I ever saws one......plain nasty !!!  Great report bubba

Ya, someone must have been loose in the lips, prolly some Alabaman drunk on shine or sumpin.  That is a freakish looking fish there Dawg, but a fish nevertheless, and a fight is a fight right  Great report G.  Joey
that is one ugly fish...
Did someone say ugly? Wheres the fish?  Sinker
Great report and pics...always guaranteed a smile or two from you.  btw are you putting on weight?

LOL...great report Glen!  I was wondering when we'd see another report...it's been a while.  So...someone was in your secret spot....ya think the internet gone and done it?? hehe.  Nice carp too...they are fun to fight aren't they?  I'll update the tourny standings on Monday...it's gonna be a close race to the finish this year!
Hey Glen, you been workin' out bud? That is one uuuuugly mother.
Sweet Home, Alabama!

Hey Glenn,  Thanks for the report. Love the colours on them Spots!!! What is the heaviest spot you have landed? I know they don't get as big as the green ones but was curious as to what a "biggen" would be considered!  Cheers, 1leg
CARP GUITAR !! LOL  great report!!! makes me feel like going carppping for a beast. Then take a carp guitar pic!
I smoked 2 cigarettes during the fight! Nothing like a good smoke after  but during!
Geez Louize that thing is a GIANT.  WTG GCD
If there is a god he should be ashamed of that creation, it just doesn't look "normal"!  Damn big fish tho.
Hey kewl!  That looks like our drums distant couzin... what with the elongated dorsal fin and carpish looking head..  You da man!  Glad you kept it clean.  cheers HD

Omyyy  that's a really ugly monster on that boat and the way it is holding that fish like a guitar is pretty funny.......If all you are going to do is catch fish that ugly come on up and we can get you in to a few Blue cats.   Art
